gmx:name.gco:CharacterString: Feature catalog for Freight Terminal Facilities: United States, 2011

gmx:scope.gco:CharacterString: Airport terminals; Railroad terminals; Marine terminals; Trucking; Freight and freightage

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: An Intermodal facility is defined as generalized descriptors for collated customers and services. The PU_FAC table contains facilities that support two or more modes of transportation. These facilities can contain an address, but must contain a latitude and longitude.
Unique name for the facility location
The primary function of the facility.
Defines all the modes that are affiliated with this facility.
The city for the facilities location
The state abbreviation for the facilities location
Federal Information Processing Standards for the states
The zip code for the facilities location
Indicates if a mail carrier is affiliated with this location
Source information of the latitude/longitude: either pre-determined or geocoded with Dynamap 2000
The date the information was placed into the database
The group of individuals responsible for populating that record
Date of modifications to that facility's entry in the database
List of other major business associated with this facility
